lines.text: [the woman in the elevator hugs Peter due to her fear of the dark, causing him to think about his similar wife and him doing partner swapping with friends]
Even then she did get her own way, but it was fun.
Oh, I'm sorry. I just have this stupid habit of talking to myself. Nothing that shock therapy couldn't overcome.

[after suddenly kissing her]
Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to do that.
Yes, you did. And I'm not sorry.
